sentences.en: Accompany Simpson in an arcade game full of action!
sentences.cn: 陪同在街机游戏的行动充分辛普森!

sentences.en: Amusement arcade; room or hall containing coin - operated machines for playing games.
sentences.cn: 游戏机室,游戏机厅(设有以硬币开动的机器).

sentences.en: An exciting swashbuckling arcade action game set on the high seas!
sentences.cn: 《鬼盗船的复仇》是发生在海面上的动作游戏.

sentences.en: At this time of the morning, the arcade is was almost empty.
sentences.cn: 在早晨的这个时候, 这个拱廊街道上几乎空无一人.

sentences.en: At this time of the morning, the arcade was almost empty.
sentences.cn: 在早晨的这个时候, 拱廊街上几乎空无一人.

sentences.en: B : We know this new shopping arcade is ready for lease.
sentences.cn: 我们知道这幢新的购物商场已开始招租.

sentences.en: Chairs and tables went flying into the arcade.
sentences.cn: 椅子,桌子飞落花流水在拱廊街上.

sentences.en: I just don't think arcade games go in the beautiful guest room.
sentences.cn: 我只是觉得街机不应该出现在美丽的客房里.

sentences.en: In our shopping arcade, you can find different kinds of souvenir.
sentences.cn: 在我们的拱廊市场, 你可以发现许多的纪念品.

sentences.en: Most arcade games are redemption games , video games or pinball machines.
sentences.cn: 在街机上运行的游戏叫街机游戏.

sentences.en: No matter how much you think you know about the varied and nuanced spectrum of human sexuality, you realize you don’t know squat until you work in a porn store with a vibrant and active arcade.
sentences.cn: 无论你认为自己是多么了解人类性行为的多样性和各种细微差别，如果没在色情商店工作过，没见识过店中那条活力四射的拱廊，就不知道半蹲是什么含义。

sentences.en: Reminiscent of SpaceInvaders, the arcade - style game that will test your reflexes.
sentences.cn: 回忆往事空间入侵者中, 将检查你的反射的拱廊风格的游戏.

sentences.en: The expensive shops in a famous arcade near Piccadilly were just opening.
sentences.cn: 皮卡迪利大街附近的一著名的拱廊街道上,几家高档商店刚刚开门.

sentences.en: The short, squat man in the Dallas Cowboys windbreaker staggers out from the arcade, propping himself against the wall.
sentences.cn: 身穿达拉斯牛仔风衣的矮胖男人蹒跚的从拱廊走出来，支撑着自己靠在墙上。

sentences.en: There was a long line of taxis waiting under the pillared arcade.
sentences.cn: 有一长排的计程车在有柱的拱廊下等.

sentences.en: We go to the amusement arcade on Saturdays to play the electronic games.
sentences.cn: 每个星期六我们去娱乐城玩电子游戏.

sentences.en: World popular hits Arcade Ball, Asteroids and Galaxy Invaders are coming back!
sentences.cn: 世界流行的点击拱廊球, 小行星和银河入侵者都回来了!

words.tran_cn: [建]拱廊；（内设投角子电子游戏机等的）游乐场；有拱廊的街道

phrases.tran_cn: 购物商场；商店街，商场部

trans.tran_cn: 商场，游乐中心，拱廊，连拱廊，有拱廊的街道
trans.tran_en: a covered passage at the side of a row of buildings with  pillar s  and  arch es  supporting it on one side
